channel.title: Npc help on 508
channel.description:
1. where can i find where i add the npcs? on like 317's it's autospawn but 508 doesnt have one??
2. i also want to add drops to them, a friend said search "npcdrops" nothing show up tho. what's it called?
3. where are the shops located, what's it called?
and also i cannot find the client.java like on normal servers?
please help thank you, im just starting with 508 servers :(

item.title: Npc help on 508
item.dc:creator: @cheeseblock cheeseblock
item.description:
@cheeseblock wrote:

ok i assume you got a good 508 source i don’t know which but here goes

  1. go to bin>data>npcs>npcspawn there’s how to spawn them. i believe.
  2. adding drops you need to add a cfg file npcdrops i’m sure there’s a tutorial how to add but thats all i know, that and you have to add some wierd codes i don’t get
  3. shops are around somewhere there’s a tutorial around
  4. there is no client.java unfortunately, most important files are in the src>pali>rs2>io>packets

Read full topic
